info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 5:13PM CDT until July 01 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Marion County in south central Illinois... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 513 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Shattuc to near Sesser, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Centralia, Centralia, Wamac, and Central City around 520 PM CDT. Salem around 525 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Helm. This includes Interstate 57 in Illinois near exit 109. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
